comments.text:
+Wrexes Fizz The problem with arrow is that it's just way too strong at 
level 1. Pudge hook is just as hard to hit; but at least hook is useless at 
level 1, you need to actually skill it for it to be good. IMO the stun 
duration should scale with levels, just like Terrorblade slow was nerfed.
comments.author: FefeLeVrai

comments.text:
You forgot how hard it is to actually hit your target for a 5 seconds stun 
if your team doesn't help you. But I can understand your point as EVERY 
(even more when it comes to Russians/Peruvians) Dota players understand 
it's a game of teamplay and I've never seen someone not slow a target for 
Mirana or mini-stun them. So rare.
